医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
针对中线神经胶质瘤 H3K27M 突变的肽疫苗在早期试验中显示出希望肿瘤疫苗可以帮助身体对抗癌症。这些疫苗会提醒患者的免疫系统注意携带癌症典型改变的蛋白质。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230922/Peptide-vaccine-targets-H3K27M-mutation-in-midline-gliomas-shows-promise-in-early-trials.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230922/Peptide-vaccine-targets-H3K27M-mutation-in-midline-gliomas-shows-promise-in-early-trials.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=511c5443-97a0-44eb-83f5-962d4ba36409 Fri, 22 Sep 2023 18:09:15 -0400 Peptide vaccine targets H3K27M mutation in midline gliomas, shows promise in early trials
社会关系可以缓冲负面童年经历对脆弱的影响虚弱是晚年成年人的一个严重问题，因为它与额外的健康风险有关，包括残疾、跌倒、住院和死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230922/Social-relationships-buffer-the-effects-of-negative-childhood-experiences-on-frailty.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230922/Social-relationships-buffer-the-effects-of-negative-childhood-experiences-on-frailty.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c3188778-897f-496d-9b7d-caef7ef9d032 Fri, 22 Sep 2023 17:52:46 -0400 Social relationships buffer the effects of negative childhood experiences on frailty
新抗癌治疗技术靶向癌细胞溶酶体并克服耐药性UNIST 化学系的 Ja-Hyoung Ryu 教授和他的研究团队开发了一种突破性的抗癌治疗技术，选择性地靶向癌细胞溶酶体并克服耐药性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230922/New-anticancer-treatment-technology-targets-cancer-cell-lysosomes-and-overcomes-drug-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230922/New-anticancer-treatment-technology-targets-cancer-cell-lysosomes-and-overcomes-drug-resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=92e46af9-baf4-424e-bd5a-3ca71341329c Fri, 22 Sep 2023 17:37:33 -0400 New anticancer treatment technology targets cancer cell lysosomes and overcomes drug resistance
研究提供了对人类 8 细胞样细胞和早期胚胎发育的见解胚胎特异性基因转录的开始，也称为胚胎基因组激活（EGA），是生物体发育过程中的关键一步。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230922/Study-provides-insights-into- human-8-cell-like-cells-and-early-embryonic-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230922/Study-provides-insights-into- human-8-cell-like-cells-and-early-embryonic-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9407a5f0-eccc-4792-b2d3-a47018cd9cf7 Fri, 22 Sep 2023 17:23:45 -0400 Study provides insights into human 8-cell-like cells and early embryonic development
组学分析确定了预测肺炎患者死亡率的新生物标志物社区获得性肺炎（CAP）是世界范围内的一种主要传染病，造成高死亡率和巨大的经济负担。严重 CAP (SCAP) 的住院死亡率仍然很高，从 25% 到 50% 以上不等。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230922/Omics-analysis-identizes-new-biomarkers-for-predicting-mortality-in-病人-with-pneumonia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230922/Omics-analysis-identizes-new-biomarkers-for-predicting-mortality-in-病人-with-pneumonia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=18ad76a3-c8aa-4b88-9460-ff20aa05a803 Fri, 22 Sep 2023 17:09:43 -0400 Omics analysis identifies new biomarkers for predicting mortality in patients with pneumonia
青春期身体活动模式与心脏代谢危险因素的变化相关一项后续研究发现，在 15 岁至 19 岁之间体力活动减少的青少年中，葡萄糖代谢、高密度脂蛋白胆固醇水平和体重指数发生了不利的变化。在体力活动增加的青少年中观察到血压降低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230922/Physical-activity-patterns- Associated-with-changes-in-cardiometabolic-risk-factors-during-adolescent.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230922/Physical-activity-patterns- Associated-with-changes-in-cardiometabolic-risk-factors-during-adolescent.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=44469d0f-42db-4fff-b66b-ac8f813846f4 Fri, 22 Sep 2023 17:00:02 -0400 Physical activity patterns associated with changes in cardiometabolic risk factors during adolescence
COVID-19 大流行增加了患者家人和朋友的心理健康负担卡罗林斯卡学院在欧洲《柳叶刀地区健康》杂志上发表的一项研究报告称，COVID-19 患者的家人和亲密朋友的抑郁和焦虑症状有所加重。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230922/COVID-19-pandemic-has-increased-mental-health-burden-on-family-and-friends-of-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230922/COVID-19-pandemic-has-increased-mental-health-burden-on-family-and-friends-of-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=65b4c8a2-cb60-461f-bc36-50a07ebe378f Fri, 22 Sep 2023 16:35:10 -0400 COVID-19 pandemic has increased mental health burden on family and friends of patients
当您考虑健康时，请不要忘记您的眼睛我清楚地记得那个周五下午晚些时候，我的眼压飙升，我摇摇晃晃地步行到我的眼科医生办公室，视野中迅速变浓的雾气笼罩着过往的汽车和交通灯。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230922/When-you-think-about-your-health-done28099t-forget-your-eyes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230922/When-you-think-about-your-health-done28099t-forget-your-eyes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e98975f7-9177-4fd4-8789-0a2c3c54d10a Fri, 22 Sep 2023 08:40:21 -0400 When you think about your health, don’t forget your eyes
新科学委员会将支持人类信托基金的“一种医学”研究由骨科兽医 Noel Fitzpatrick 教授于 2014 年创立的慈善机构 Humanimal Trust 宣布成立新的独立顾问委员会，该委员会由来自世界各地的领先人类和动物健康专业人士、学者和研究人员组成。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230922/New-science-committee-to-support-One-Medicine-research-at-Humanimal-Trust.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230922/New-science-committee-to-support-One-Medicine-research-at-Humanimal-Trust.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d74bfd2e-ce7a-4553-8ec3-aae4d875eebe Fri, 22 Sep 2023 08:36:00 -0400 New science committee to support One Medicine research at Humanimal Trust
研究表明，杏仁可以成为健康减肥饮食的一部分说到减肥，坚果可能会受到不好的评价——虽然它们蛋白质含量高，但脂肪含量也很高，这往往会阻止那些想要减掉几公斤的人。但南澳大利亚大学的新研究表明，吃杏仁也可以减肥。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230922/Almonds-can-be-part-of-a-healthy-weight-loss-diet-research-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230922/Almonds-can-be-part-of-a-healthy-weight-loss-diet-research-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7290f6b3-b6ba-4aa9-9d98-d58b8c36ba03 Fri, 22 Sep 2023 08:27:00 -0400 Almonds can be part of a healthy weight loss diet, research shows
